concept.title: Go-Live
concept.shortdesc: Once you have made your decision, it's time to think how to move your process to the selected TMS.

conbody.p: You thought it took a long time to make up your mind on which TMS to choose for your company, but it may take even longer to prepare the whole go-live process. Draft a plan involving your internal stakeholders, translation resources and vendors - there are so many aspects to cover. And... once again remember about the deadline you set earlier.
The final process should include the following steps:

li.xref: Managing user access rights and roles
Setting up TMS to work with your vendors
